title: Kieran Culkin goofs around as wife Jazz Charton posts their first family photo with daughter Kinsey
text:
Kieran Culkin and wife Jazz Charton recently welcomed their first child.

And the new mom took to Instagram Saturday with their first family photo featuring daughter Kinsey.

The couple made a series of silly faces in a classic black-and-white photo booth strip.

Family photo: Kieran Culkin's wife Jazz Charton took to Instagram Saturday with their first family photo featuring newborn daughter Kinsey

Meanwhile, the baby girl, who was born September 13, was sound asleep in mommy's arms.

Charton posted the impromptu photo shoot with the brief, yet appropriate caption: 'Parents.'

The Scott Pilgrim vs. the World star, 37, has been married to Charton, 31, since 2013.

Happy couple: The Scott Pilgrim vs. the World star, 37, has been married to Charton, 31, since 2013

Firstborn: They welcomed Kinsey, their first child, on September 13

Before Kinsey's arrival, Culkin told Jimmy Fallon: 'I'm not having any of the freak-outs or the nervousness that everyone tells me I should be having. All I am is excited.'

Culkin also recently appeared on The Late Late Show with James Corden, joined by fellow guest Adam DeVine.

The trio performed a hilarious skit, in which the new dad had to explain to the other two grown men how babies are made.

Excited dad: Before Kinsey's arrival, Culkin told Jimmy Fallon: 'I'm not having any of the freak-outs or the nervousness that everyone tells me I should be having. All I am is excited'

Special guest: Culkin also recently appeared on The Late Late Show with James Corden, joined by fellow guest Adam DeVine

Birds and bees: The trio performed a hilarious skit, in which the new dad had to explain to the other two grown men how babies are made

He appeared last week in the season two finale of Succession, in which he stars as Roman.

He plays the son of a media mogul in the HBO series about a dysfunctional family fighting for the keys to a global empire.

Culkin nabbed a Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role nomination at this year's Golden Globes for his role.
description: Culkin appeared last week in the season finale of Succession, in which he stars as Roman, earning a Best Performance by an Actor in a Supporting Role nomination at this year's Golden Globes.
